title: Oxon Cove  Park & Oxon Hill Farm: Calendar
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Calendar            Calendar       Check the database below for a daily activities. We offer a wide assortment of programs geared to a wide range of audiences. So, if you are a kid or an adult, if you like history or nature; there is something for you at Oxon Cove Park! Programs may be canceled without prior notice. Please call before you come to check the schedule. The number is 301-839-1176.        Visitors help press apples into cider during our 2009 Cultural Holiday Festival.            Keyword       By Date     Start Date      End Date          Search         Upcoming Events    Showing 5 results    Show ALL instances of recurring events   RSS Feed      Oxon Cove  Park & Oxon Hill Farm  Meet the Dairy Cow      Time: 10:00 AM Location: Dairy Barn Fees: Free     Sunday, August 14, 2016 Learn about dairy with a milking demonstration. View Details      Oxon Cove  Park & Oxon Hill Farm  Weekend Wagon Rides      Time: 10:30 AM to 11:30 AM Location: Oxon Hill Farm Fees: free     Sunday, August 14, 2016 Every Sunday Weekly & Every Saturday Weekly  from 06/04/2016 to 05/28/2017 Take a scenic wagon ride through the park. View Details      Oxon Cove  Park & Oxon Hill Farm  Reading Stories with Ranger Steph      Time: 9:30 AM to 10:30 AM Location: Oxon Hill Farm Visitor Barn Fees: free     Monday, August 15, 2016 Come listen to stories, sing songs, and enjoy other activities. View Details      Oxon Cove  Park & Oxon Hill Farm  Wagon Ride      Time: 10:30 AM Location: Oxon Hill Farm Fees: free     Tuesday, August 16, 2016 Take a scenic Wagon Ride through the park. View Details      Oxon Cove  Park & Oxon Hill Farm  Sunday Shoreline Sweep-up      Time: 1:00 PM to 3:30 PM Location: Oxon Cove Park Fees: free     Sunday, September 4, 2016 Every 1st Sunday of every month. from 07/03/2016 to 05/07/2017 Help us clean up trash along the banks of Oxon Cove.
